title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.15 - Employee peripheral parking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.15 - Employee peripheral parking

State Regulations

In Albany, OGS operates several peripheral parking
areas to accommodate the vehicles of State employees. Bus service associated
with these State operated peripheral parking lots is intended for permit
holders and car pool members only. The parking lot attendant will refuse bus
service to anyone who is not a permit holder and/or car pool member for the
respective parking lot. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
296-1.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
